example.name: autogen1
example.text: Weighing 6.7 pounds with battery , the notebook measures 8.2 by 11.7 inches , has a 20-megabyte hard disk drive and boasts a backlit screen that is 22 % larger than Compaq 's .

example.text: the Sago is relatively rare and grows only a couple of inches a year
